CustomField.description: EMEA_SOW_StandardBank_013: Case 1061 - As a user I need to see who the Opportunity is shared with. Opens the Opportunity Sharing information in a new window. Modified EN - 956 - To redirect to Opportunity Visibility Page
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK('/apex/OppSharedWith_Navigate?oppId=' & Id & '&uiTheme=' & $User.UIThemeDisplayed, 'Who is this Opportunity shared with?', '_self')
CustomField.label: View Sharing
